Tucson falls to the ground, and sits up against a wall.  Lamia's attacks di=
d take a slight toll on him.  

" Wow, I'd definitely would not recommend t=
hat anyone tries this at home.  I'm - all right, I think.  My neck and my f=
oot will need some repair work, other than that.. Ughhh, oh yeah, theres th=
is venom that Lamia got me with...  I- managed to neutralize the greater ef=
fects although, I don't think I got all of it.  But - for now, danger avert=
ed."

He tries to direct an ear toward Talon.

"Talon, thank you for puttin=
g up with me. I know it's not easy working with a bot who thinks outside th=
e box."

He sends a message back to Lord Perseus.

"Lord Perseus, I'm pleas=
ed to inform you that although one minion has escaped we have managed to ca=
pture Nightstrike and will be bringing him aboard for questioning.  I'd lik=
e permission to question him personally."
